itunes:title: The Banned Books Episode
title: The Banned Books Episode
description:
In Episode 70 of Book Talk, Etc. Tina and Renee welcome the third member of Book Talk, etc- Jonathan- to share our recent banned book reads. They also share what they've been loving lately, their latest reads, shelf additions, and have book talk about banned books

**If you enjoy our commercial free podcast please consider supporting us on Patreon ! We have great bonus episodes including: Books we DNFed, Books We Disagreed On, What's in the Mailbag, Second Year Spoiler Author Chat, + our ALL NEW CRIMINALLY BOOKED! Plus, we host fun Zoom events like Mood Reader Happy Hour and Book Talk Book Club, a private Facebook group & our NEW DISCORD where you can interact with other patrons all for just $5 a month!

Loving Lately
2:57 Nano Face Steamer (J)
6:00 Standing Desk & Treadmill (T)
9:28 The Patient (Tv Show Hulu)

Latest Reads
14:00 Radium Girls | Kate Moore (J)
14:15 The Woman They Could Not Silence |Kate Moore
Say Nothing | Patrick Radden Keefe
My Favorite Murder
17:02 The Most Likely Club | Elyssa Friedland (T)
21:14 Daisy Darker | Alice Feeney (R) ðŸŽ§
His and Hers |Alice Feeney

24:34 Book Talk
44:42 Flowers in the Attic | VC Andrews
44:55 Pet Semetery |Stephen King
Supreme Court Article About Book Banning Decisions
45:16 My Bloody Life |Reymondo Sanchez
46:45 Brooklyn Public Libraries - Books Unbanned
47:35 What Students Are Saying About Banning Books

49:10 Our Books Read
49:16 Looking for Alaska |John GreenÂ  (J) ðŸŽ§
Paper Towns , An Abundance of Katherines | John Green
Will Grayson Will Grayson, The Fault in our Stars| JG
53:28 Manic Pixie Dreamgirl
57:56 Gender Queer |Maia Kobabe (T)
1:00:48 Extremely Loud and Incredibly Close |Johnathan Safran Foer (R) ðŸŽ§
1:07:38 Melissa (formerly George) | Alex Gino (J) ðŸŽ§
1:16:03 The Kite Runner |Khaled Hosseini (T) ðŸŽ§
1:21:20 Trash | Andy Mulligan (R) ðŸŽ§

*The book titles listed are linked to Amazon Affiliates, where we make a small commission from qu

Thanks so much for listening!ðŸŽ§

Email us at booktalketc@gmail
